name: AP_CLAIM_PX_SL_LEVELS
description:
This table contains the allowed amount adjudication levels for AP Claim service lines before stop loss was applied.





To link this tableï¿½s service line information back to a claim header, join this table to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS on the TX_ID column. If you need to report on claim service lines specific to Cost Sharing Reduction (CSR), join this table instead to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS_CSR on the TX_ID column.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the AP Claim procedure transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_LEVEL
columns.description: The allowed amount adjudication levels the procedure would have had if stop loss was not applied. Information from this caret delimited string is parsed out in subsequent columns.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_PMT_LV
columns.description: The level of payment for the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim had stop loss not been applied.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_CVD
columns.description: The covered number of procedures or units of the allowed number of procedures or units for the service line of the AP Claim had stop loss not been applied.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_LM_TYP
columns.description: The limit type (such as procedure dollar amount or procedure count) of the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim had stop loss not been applied. This column is frequently used to link to the ZC_PROV_CONT_LM_TY table.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_PMT_MECH
columns.description: The payment mechanism for the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim had stop loss not been applied. This column is frequently used to link to the ZC_SVC_PAY_MECH table.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_FSC
columns.description: The ID of the fee schedule used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim had stop loss not been applied.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_FSC_FEE_SCHEDULE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each fee schedule.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_PRICE
columns.description: The price of the service line allowed amount on the AP Claim had stop loss not been applied.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_RATE
columns.description: The Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) rate used in determining the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim had stop loss not been applied.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_HMU
columns.description: The ID of the conversion factor table used to price a service line using Relative Value Unit (RVU) pricing had stop loss not been applied.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_HMU_TABLE_NAME
columns.description: The name for the conversion factor table.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_TOS
columns.description: The type of service used to get the conversion factor in Relative Value Unit (RVU) pricing had stop loss not been applied.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_UNITS
columns.description: The total number of time units used to determine the price of an anesthesia procedure on an AP Claim had stop loss not been applied.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_DSCNT
columns.description: Discount percentage used in calculating the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim had stop loss not been applied.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_MULT
columns.description: The multiplier or conversion factor value used in calculating the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim had stop loss not been applied.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_RVU_VALUE
columns.description: The Relative Value Unit (RVU) value of the procedure on the service line of the AP Claim had stop loss not been applied.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_LPP_CMMT
columns.description: The comment added by the pricing extension, which was used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim had stop loss not been applied.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_FSM
columns.description: The ID of the fee schedule map used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim had stop loss not been applied.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_FSM_FEE_SCHEDULE_MAP_NAME
columns.description: The name for the fee schedule map record.

columns.name: PRE_STOP_LOSS_ZIP
columns.description: When a fee schedule map is used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP claim, this column contains the postal code where the service was performed had stop loss not been applied.
